data.description: Single story duplex with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathes in each unit. Both units feature substantial cabinet and counter space, washer and dryer connections, and sizable bedrooms. In-suite master bathroom in both units. Vacant unit features new paint and updated flooring/carpet. Ideal location-close to Hwy 78/I-285 interstates/public transportation and downtown Stone Mountain. Great opportunity for rental income or “house-hacking”! One unit will be delivered vacant at closing.
